summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Garfield Street, from Fifteenth Avenue West to a point one thousand two hundred sixty-five (1,2650 feet) west of the west margin of Fifteenth Avenue West; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 5653, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
